channel.title: How to make my 474 client work with mac
channel.description:

item.title: How to make my 474 client work with mac
item.dc:creator: @arean1 arean1
item.description:
@arean1 wrote:

line 139: try changing “user.home” to:

user.home/acheron.cache

Let me know if that worked for you.

Read full topic
